mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_company_review WHERE review_allow = 0) as reviewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_company_interview WHERE interview_allow = 0) as interviewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_company_salary WHERE salary_allow = 0) as salaryCount FROM DUAL
SELECT visitant_today_count as visitantTodayCount, (SELECT SUM(visitant_today_count) FROM tb_visitant_count) as visitantTotalCount FROM tb_visitant_count WHERE visitant_regdate = #{visitantRegdate}
SELECT visitant_today_count as visitantTodayCount, visitant_regdate as visitantRegdate FROM tb_visitant_count ORDER BY visitant_regdate LIMIT 6
